title: Transformational Marketing Leadership: Freirean Praxis-Based Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental marketing theory and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Hands-on VR-based education in BYOD environments, with marketing scenarios incorporating social responsibility and technology ethics

learning_goals: Learners analyze marketing cases involving ethical dilemmas through VR simulations and demonstrate the ability to propose alternatives
Learners propose three or more socially contextualized marketing strategies in discussions based on the Freirean praxis model
Comprehensive evaluation of technological, environmental, and social impacts through team-based simulation assessment reports
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
